page.title: 16LAW AND ORDER IN CURY AREA
page.content: There are no Police Stations or resident Policemen in the area of Cury or Gunwalloe/Berepper. It is policed by mobile patrol cars from Mullion, a larger village a few miles away in adjoining area. Further patrolling may be carried out from the town of Helston some five miles away. The nearest fully manned Police station is at Camborne some fifteen miles distance. This station would supply the necessary resources and crime squad for serious offences or any major enquiry. There is a comparatively low crime rate in the area;though there are incidents requiring police action and charges being brought.i.e. Rustling! and other stealing from farms. Also other offences mainly of a minor nature which include motoring offences, drunkeness, etc.
